name: payment-initiation-api-spec
description: Tools to compile and flatten JSON schemas, and generate Swagger Docs

scripts.build:swagger: npm run flatten-schemas && npm run compile-swagger
scripts.build: npm run build:swagger && npm run build:spectacle
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:wsd && npm run swagger2markdown && npm run swagger2asciidoc && npm run asciidoc2html && npm run asciidoc2pdf
scripts.swagger2markdown: java -jar swagger2markup-cli-1.3.1.jar convert -i dist/payment-initiation-swagger.yaml -f dist/payment-initiation-swagger -c build/swagger2markup/markdown.properties
scripts.swagger2html: npm run swagger2asciidoc && npm run asciidoc2html
scripts.swagger2pdf: npm run swagger2asciidoc && npm run asciidoc2pdf
scripts.asciidoc2html: asciidoctor asciidoc/index.adoc -a toc=left -a toclevels=4 -a numbered='' -o dist/payment-initiation-swagger.html
scripts.asciidoc2pdf: asciidoctor -r asciidoctor-pdf -b pdf asciidoc/index.adoc -a toc=left -a toclevels=4 -a numbered='' -o dist/payment-initiation-swagger.pdf
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run serve
